subject: Baseball
lead_paragraph: Carlos Beltran’s sacrifice fly helped the Mets beat the Nationals on Wednesday, but on Tuesday, Beltran, Oliver Perez and Luis Castillo skipped an optional team appearance.
snippet: Carlos Beltran’s sacrifice fly helped the Mets beat the Nationals on Wednesday, but on Tuesday, Beltran, Oliver Perez and Luis Castillo skipped an optional team appearance.
